item.title: Torva Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

u loose:

Well if you want help private message me your sykpe and I’ll add you and help you asap

some one already posted the torva models on here.

Just dl them then put them in your client. remeber to use the proper wield id when put it in

example

case 6884: itemDef.modelID = 11;//drop id? itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738;//wield model id itemDef.anInt200 = 62754;//wield model id(one of these is male and female) itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Torva Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:3, topic:525636”]Here are my ints

case 6884: itemDef.modelID = 11; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;
here is some background information about my server that might help.

1.) Everything is cache packed.
2.) To add models, i put the ints in itemdef.java and make a raw folder in my client and put the .dat file in there
3.) the .dat # is 11
4.) when i go in-game i write add model
5.) then i get a screen like this: http://prntscr.com/1gmf11
6.) when i enter 11 i get this: http://prntscr.com/1gmf4i

Still looking for help[/quote]

By looking at that. Torvas model id is alot higher than 11.

If you have Skype private message me your user, and when I get home I’ll take a look for you

Read full topic

item.title: Torva Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers

@Host_Gushers wrote:

Here are my ints

case 6884: itemDef.modelID = 11; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;
here is some background information about my server that might help.

1.) Everything is cache packed.
2.) To add models, i put the ints in itemdef.java and make a raw folder in my client and put the .dat file in there
3.) the .dat # is 11
4.) when i go in-game i write add model
5.) then i get a screen like this: http://prntscr.com/1gmf11
6.) when i enter 11 i get this: http://prntscr.com/1gmf4i

Still looking for help
